createidentitysource.name: CreateIdentitySource
createidentitysource.description: Grants permission to create a reference to an external identity provider (IdP) that is compatible with OpenID Connect (OIDC) authentication protocol, such as Amazon Cognito

createpolicy.name: CreatePolicy
createpolicy.description: Grants permission to create a Cedar policy and save it in the specified policy store

createpolicystore.name: CreatePolicyStore
createpolicystore.description: Grants permission to create a Cedar policy and save it in the specified policy store

createpolicytemplate.name: CreatePolicyTemplate
createpolicytemplate.description: Grants permission to create a policy template

deleteidentitysource.name: DeleteIdentitySource
deleteidentitysource.description: Grants permission to delete an identity source that references an identity provider (IdP) such as Amazon Cognito

deletepolicy.name: DeletePolicy
deletepolicy.description: Grants permission to delete the specified policy from the policy store

deletepolicystore.name: DeletePolicyStore
deletepolicystore.description: Grants permission to delete the specified policy store

deletepolicytemplate.name: DeletePolicyTemplate
deletepolicytemplate.description: Grants permission to delete the specified policy template from the policy store

getidentitysource.name: GetIdentitySource
getidentitysource.description: Grants permission to retrieve the details about the specified identity source

getpolicy.name: GetPolicy
getpolicy.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the specified policy

getpolicystore.name: GetPolicyStore
getpolicystore.description: Grants permission to retrieve details about a policy store

getpolicytemplate.name: GetPolicyTemplate
getpolicytemplate.description: Grants permission to retrieve the details for the specified policy template in the specified policy store

getschema.name: GetSchema
getschema.description: Grants permission to retrieve the details for the specified schema in the specified policy store

isauthorized.name: IsAuthorized
isauthorized.description: Grants permission to make an authorization decision about a service request described in the parameters

isauthorizedwithtoken.name: IsAuthorizedWithToken
isauthorizedwithtoken.description: Grants permission to make an authorization decision about a service request described in the parameters. The principal in this request comes from an external identity source

listidentitysources.name: ListIdentitySources
listidentitysources.description: Grants permission to return a paginated list of all of the identity sources defined in the specified policy store

listpolicies.name: ListPolicies
listpolicies.description: Grants permission to return a paginated list of all policies stored in the specified policy store

listpolicystores.name: ListPolicyStores
listpolicystores.description: Grants permission to return a paginated list of all policy stores in the calling Amazon Web Services account

listpolicytemplates.name: ListPolicyTemplates
listpolicytemplates.description: Grants permission to return a paginated list of all policy templates in the specified policy store

putschema.name: PutSchema
putschema.description: Grants permission to create or update the policy schema in the specified policy store

updateidentitysource.name: UpdateIdentitySource
updateidentitysource.description: Grants permission to update the specified identity source to use a new identity provider (IdP) source, or to change the mapping of identities from the IdP to a different principal entity type

updatepolicy.name: UpdatePolicy
updatepolicy.description: Grants permission to modify the specified Cedar static policy in the specified policy store

updatepolicystore.name: UpdatePolicyStore
updatepolicystore.description: Grants permission to modify the validation setting for a policy store

updatepolicytemplate.name: UpdatePolicyTemplate
updatepolicytemplate.description: Grants permission to update the specified policy template
